::: {.cell}

:::

::: {.cell}

### Version history

This page provides information about older or alternative versions of  indicative distribution map for this ecosystem functional group [**{{< meta params.efgname >}}**](/efg-info/TF1_4.qmd).
Check the current maps [here](/map-info/TF1_4_valid.qmd).

- Indicative Map (**code: TF1.4.IM.alt**, version v2.0) discarded 
 - Web navigation (**code: TF1.4.web.orig**, version v1.0) requires review 
 - Indicative Map (**code: TF1.4.IM.orig**, version v1.0) discarded 
 - Web navigation (**code: TF1.4.WM.nwx**, version v1.0) in preparation 
 - Web navigation (**code: TF1.4.web.mix**, version v1.0) requires review 

### Datasets

Datasets considered for previous versions of the indicative map

- **FEOW-2008** (Abell et al. 2008).
 - **GLWD-2004** (Lehner and Döll 2004).
 - **KG-climate-2018** (Beck et al. 2018).
 - **Tropical-Wetlands-v2** (Gumbricht et al. 2017).

::: {.cell}
::: {.cell-output-display}


|dataset              |url                                                                                                                                                                                       |
|:--------------------|:-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------|
|FEOW-2008            |<https://www.feow.org/>{target='links'} :: <https://geospatial.tnc.org/datasets/38da4656e8074e1c820c42cc21cd76cd_0>{target='links'}                                                       |
|GLWD-2004            |<https://www.worldwildlife.org/pages/global-lakes-and-wetlands-database>{target='links'}                                                                                                  |
|KG-climate-2018      |<http://www.gloh2o.org/koppen/>{target='links'} :: <https://doi.org/10.6084/m9.figshare.6396959>{target='links'}                                                                          |
|Tropical-Wetlands-v2 |<http://www.cifor.org/global-wetlands/>{target='links'} :: <https://www.cifor.org/knowledge/dataset/1614/>{target='links'} :: <https://doi.org/10.17528/CIFOR/DATA.00058>{target='links'} |


:::
:::

### Available files

You can download geospatial data for older versions of these maps from the following sources:

**TF1.4.web.orig** (v1.0): [GitHub repository](https://github.com/red-list-ecosystem/typology-map-data/blob/master/data/layers/TF1.4.web.orig_topo.json){target="gisdata"}

**TF1.4.IM.orig** (v1.0): [Zenodo repository (EFG map)](http://doi.org/10.5281/zenodo.3958622){target="gisdata"}

**TF1.4.web.mix** (v1.0): [GitHub repository](https://github.com/red-list-ecosystem/typology-map-data/blob/master/data/layers/TF1.4.web.mix_v1.0_topo.json){target="gisdata"}

Note that you need to login to some services like [mapbox](https://www.mapbox.com){target="links"} or [earthengine](https://earthengine.google.com){target="links"}, and in some cases you also need to request access to the files.

###  License information

Indicative maps have been released with a ![](https://zenodo.org/static/icons/licenses/cc-by-icon.svg){height=20} Creative Commons Attribution 4.0 International license. 

But see details of dataset licenses below:

::: {.cell}
::: {.cell-output-display}


|dataset         |license_info                                                                                                   |
|:---------------|:--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------|
|FEOW-2008       |https://www.feow.org/copyright :: custom license :: non commercial use                                         |
|GLWD-2004       |The data is available for free download for non-commercial scientific :: conservation and educational purposes |
|KG-climate-2018 |https://www.gloh2o.org/terms-of-use/ :: https://creativecommons.org/licenses/by-nc/4.0/ :: CC BY 4.0           |


:::
:::

## References

References used in these versions of the maps.

- Lehner, B. and Döll, P. (2004): *Development and validation of a global database of lakes, reservoirs and wetlands*. **Journal of Hydrology** 296/1-4: 1-22. [Data-set](https://www.worldwildlife.org/pages/global-lakes-and-wetlands-database) 
 - Beck, H., Zimmermann, N., McVicar, T. et al. (2018) *Present and future Köppen-Geiger climate classification maps at 1-km resolution* **Sci Data** 5, 180214 [DOI:10.1038/sdata.2018.214](http:dx.doi.org/10.1038/sdata.2018.214) 
 - Thomas Gumbricht Rosa Maria Roman‐Cuesta Louis Verchot Martin Herold Florian Wittmann Ethan Householder Nadine Herold Daniel Murdiyarso (2017) *An expert system model for mapping tropical wetlands and peatlands reveals South America as the largest contributor* **Glob Change Biol.** 23: 3581– 3599 [DOI:10.1111/gcb.13689](http:dx.doi.org/10.1111/gcb.13689) 
 - Abell R, Thieme ML, Revenga C, Bryer M, Kottelat M, Bogutskaya N, Coad B, Mandrak N, Contreras Balderas S, Bussing W, Stiassny MLJ, Skelton P, Allen GR, Unmack P, Naseka A, Ng R, Sindorf N, Robertson J, Armijo E, Higgins JV, Heibel TJ, Wikramanayake E, Olson D, López HL, Reis RE, Lundberg JG, Sabaj Pérez MH, Petry P (2008) *Freshwater ecoregions of the world: A new map of biogeographic units for freshwater biodiversity conservation*, **BioScience** 58: 403–414. DOI:[10.1641/B580507](https://doi.org/10.1641/B580507)
